page.title: 14Quinton Housewife's Day
page.content: Wednesday starts when woken by radio alarm at 06.30 followed half an hour later by breakfast for family of husband & 2 young daughters, with husband leaving for work at 07.30. Eldest child Aimee aged 6 catches school bus at 08.00 and 08.45 leave for playschool with younger daughter Hazel aged 3 and 2 other young children. Help at playschool before heading home at 11.45 to get husband's dinner ready for his hour lunch break. Spend afternoon on housework before Aimee arrives home at 16.00, then prepare evening meal and work for Girl Guide meeting. Evening meal eaten when husband returns from work at 17.30. Children put to bed by 19.00 then off to Guide meeting until 21.30 before returning home for supper and relaxing half hour with husband before bedtime.
